course_description: Master Python basics: variables, data types, functions, and control flow. Build foundational programming skills for data science.
Learn to efficiently manipulate and analyze data using pandas DataFrames, including filtering, grouping, and merging datasets.
Master relational database fundamentals: SELECT queries, JOINs, aggregations, and subqueries for data retrieval.
Build predictive models using classification, regression, and clustering algorithms with scikit-learn.
